0.text: Innate: Caitlyn's basic attacks generate a stack of Headshot  on-attack, doubled when attacking from  brush. At 6 stacks, or 5 while in brush, Caitlyn's next basic attack has an  uncancelable windup and deals (50 / 75 / 100% (based on level) + (109.375% +  21.875%) critical strike chance) AD bonus physical damage, increased to (100% + (109.375% +  21.875%) critical strike chance) AD against non-champions.

1.text: Caitlyn may fire more than one empowered basic attack until Headshot hits a target, which consumes all stacks.

2.text: Enemies that step over a  Yordle Snap Trap or are hit by  90 Caliber Net can grant an additional headshot against them at  1300 range for 1.8 seconds, without consuming stacks of Headshot. Basic attacks that use granted Headshots have a 0.25-second cast time.

0.text: Active: Caitlyn fires a piercing shot in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy it passes through, after which it expands in width but deals only 60% damage to enemies it passes thereafter.

1.text: Enemies  revealed by  Yordle Snap Trap always take  full damage from Piltover Peacemaker.

0.text: Passive: Caitlyn periodically stocks a Yordle Snap Trap charge, up to a maximum amount.

1.text: Active: Caitlyn sets a visible  untargetable trap at the target location which grants  sight of the area for 1 second and arms after 1 second, lasting for a duration. After the maximum amount of traps is laid down, deploying another immediately destroys the oldest one.

2.text: The next enemy champion that springs the trap is  rooted for 1.5 seconds,  revealed for 3 seconds, takes additional damage from  Headshot, and becomes immune to further Yordle Snap Traps for 3 seconds.

3.text: Yordle Snap Traps trigger simultaneously if stacked on top of each other, granting additional  Headshots for each one beyond the first, but only increasing the damage for the first one.

0.text: Active: Caitlyn fires a net in the target direction and  recoils 390 units in the opposite direction. The net deals magic damage to the first enemy hit and  slows them by 50% for 1 second.

1.text: Caitlyn will not dash backwards if she is  immobilized or  grounded during the cast time.

2.text: Caitlyn can cast any of her abilities while  dashing.

0.text: Active: Caitlyn locks onto the target enemy champion and  channels for 1 second,  revealing them for 2.75 seconds and  revealing herself in the process from the start of the cast time.

1.text: Ace in the Hole is placed on a 5-second  cooldown if canceled.

2.text: Once Caitlyn completes the channel, she fires a homing bullet toward the target that deals physical damage to the first enemy champion it hits.

1.concerningText: Active: Caitlyn fires a piercing shot in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy it passes through, after which it expands in width but deals only 60% damage to enemies it passes thereafter.

2.concerningText: The next enemy champion that springs the trap is  rooted for 1.5 seconds,  revealed for 3 seconds, takes additional damage from  Headshot, and becomes immune to further Yordle Snap Traps for 3 seconds.

3.concerningText: Active: Caitlyn fires a net in the target direction and  recoils 390 units in the opposite direction. The net deals magic damage to the first enemy hit and  slows them by 50% for 1 second.

4.concerningText: Once Caitlyn completes the channel, she fires a homing bullet toward the target that deals physical damage to the first enemy champion it hits.

0.concerningText: Active: Caitlyn fires a piercing shot in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy it passes through, after which it expands in width but deals only 60% damage to enemies it passes thereafter.

The next enemy champion that springs the trap is  rooted for 1.5 seconds,  revealed for 3 seconds, takes additional damage from  Headshot, and becomes immune to further Yordle Snap Traps for 3 seconds.
Active: Caitlyn fires a net in the target direction and  recoils 390 units in the opposite direction. The net deals magic damage to the first enemy hit and  slows them by 50% for 1 second.
Once Caitlyn completes the channel, she fires a homing bullet toward the target that deals physical damage to the first enemy champion it hits.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Cloudburst: Dash to the target location, though not through terrain, and fire three homing missiles at the most wounded enemy within 750 radius of you at the end of the dash, prioritizing enemy champions. Each missile deals 60 − 105 (based on level) (+ 15% bonus AD) magic damage, for a total of 180 − 315 (based on level) (+ 45% bonus AD), increased by 0% − 50% (based on target's missing health) (90 second cooldown; 200 - 425 range).
active.originText: UNIQUE – CLOUDBURST:  Dash to the target location, though not through terrain, and fire three homing missiles at the most wounded enemy within 750 radius of you at the end of the dash, prioritizing enemy champions. Each missile deals 60 − 105 (based on level) (+ 15% bonus AD) magic damage, for a total of 180 − 315 (based on level) (+ 45% bonus AD), increased by 0% − 50% (based on target's missing health) (90 second cooldown; 200 - 425 range).
